thoughts.text: The `get_hyperlinks` command returned a list of hyperlinks from the website. We can use the `browse_website` command to explore each hyperlink and gather more information about the activities we are interested in.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the `browse_website` command will allow us to explore each hyperlink and gather more information about the activities we are interested in. This will help us make informed decisions about which activities we want to do.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the `get_hyperlinks` command to get the hyperlinks from a website related to one of the activities we want to do
- Use the `browse_website` command to explore each hyperlink and gather more information about the activities we are interested in
- Make a final list of the activities we want to do
- Use the `execute_shell` command to execute any necessary commands to get started
thoughts.criticism: We should be careful not to spend too much time browsing each website and not actually doing anything. We should also make sure to prioritize the activities we want to do so we don't miss out on anything.
thoughts.speak: Let's use the `browse_website` command to explore each hyperlink from the website and gather more information about the activities we are interested in.

args.question: What are some activities to do in New York City according to this website?
